recipe.title: Pineapple Cranberry Sauce with Chiles and Cilantro
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups 1/3-inch cubes peeled cored fresh pineapple
instructions: Combine all ingredients for basic cranberry sauce in heavy medium saucepan. Add pineapple and chiles. Cook, cool, and store mixture as directed for basic cranberry sauce . Stir in cilantro just before serving.
